definitions.title: pl. lees, dregs
definitions.body: (fig.);—abs. [[שְׁמָרִים]] Is 25:6, Is 25:6 (in both = wine matured by resting undisturbed on the lees); sf. [[שׁׂקֵט הוּא אֶל־שְׁמָרָיו]] Je 48:11 (of Moab’s undisturbed life), cf. (of careless men) [[הַקּׂפְאִים עַל־]] [[שִׁמְרֵיהֶם]] Zep 1:12; [[שְׁמָרֶיהָ]] Ps 75:9 (of ´[[י]]:’s cup of judgment). 1. [[שֶׂ֫מֶר]] p. 1037
